Question: Hi, I bought the foil lids for the Vertuo line. Generally they work fine, but why are they so big? Why not make them so they correctly fit the pods? I'd like to be able to fill a week's worth of pods at one time, but since these things are so big I have no confidence they won't leak or go stale.
Response:
Thank you for writing to us and we're sorry to hear that you're having issues. Our foils are designed so that they provide air-tight, well sealed capsules so you can make as many in advance as you want. A recommendation we would suggest would be to center the foil on top of the capsule and make sure to depress the inside edge of the foil on the capsule. And then press the foil down around the edges.

We hope this helps!

Warm regards,
Your My-Cap Team
